statements: DELETE FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE telescope_name = 'Hubble Telescope';

DELETE FROM videos WHERE video_id = 1;
DELETE FROM images WHERE image_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Telescopes WHERE location = 'Mauna Kea';

DELETE FROM Videos WHERE telescope_id = 201 AND capture_date > '2021-07-15';

DELETE FROM telescopes WHERE location = 'Mauna Kea' AND launch_date < '2020-01-01';
